verses.verse: O praise<WH1984> the LORD,<WH3068> all<WH3605> you nations:<WH1471> praise<WH7623> him, all<WH3605> you people.<WH523>
For his merciful<WH2617> kindness<WH2617> is great<WH1396> toward<WH5921> us: and the truth<WH571> of the LORD<WH3068> endures for ever.<WH5769> Praise<WH1984> you the LORD.<WH3050>
